item.title: Athletes Celebrated The Tokyo Olympics Opening Ceremony In An Empty Stadium
item.description:
Due to the pandemic, the opening ceremony took place Friday before a practically empty stadium. But the host country Japan still put on a dazzling show.

View Entire Post ›
item.dc:creator: Pia Peterson

item.title: The Director Of The Olympics Opening Ceremony Has Been Fired For A Holocaust “Joke” He Made In 1998
item.description:
“I understand that my foolish choice of words at the time was a mistake, and I regret it.”
